title: Santa Con: The War on Christmas

sources.title: The War on Christmas: A Measured Response
sources.description: Original: https://youtu.be/jbZo4x0NbbI The description says: Christmas is a moo point. My Twitter: https://twitter.com/hbomberguy My Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/Hbomb My Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/hbomberguy/

metadata.Plot: On the eve of the holiday season, a lower Manhattan bar recruits a new waitress to their ranks. Little does she know, she's about to be thrown into the greatest battle known to NYC, Santa Con.
metadata.Actors: Sam Bernstein, Erin Byun, Tyler Coleman
